trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Mhon Mon is being plagued by hellish beasts and an empty stomach.
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_TODO_00<tab>Lie in wait for the wandering weapon.
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_000<tab>Oooh! What to do? What to do?
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_001<tab>I want to make traditional Mord stew and I only need one more ingredient─Amber weed.
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_002<tab>But it has become scarce around here, except for in an area that is plagued by evil weapons!

TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_003<tab>Funny name, not so funny when they are trying to kill you, though! There is an especially horrible one called the wandering weapon who the others seem to follow.
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_004<tab>If you could get rid of it, the rest might leave us alone. Then I can finally harvest Amber weed in peace. So, will you help us?
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_010<tab>I hate that wandering weapon and its big, stupid face!
TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_020<tab>You did it? Hooray! Now that Amber weed will be mine! Heh heh heh...

TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_021<tab>But I wonder if the other evil weapons will come back... I hear they were made by the mages of Nabaath Areng from enchanted swords. Do not ask me how they ended up looking like that, though!

TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_022<tab>Apparently, their masters disappeared after the Flood. With no one to command them, they have been prowling around Amber, attacking everything that comes close!

TEXT_LUCKZG002_03487_MHONMON_000_023<tab>I hope that by getting rid of the wandering weapon, they will stay away for a while, but who can say? All I know is, I can make my stew now! My stomach thanks you!
